document_data.caption: A map of the Neverwinter Wood depicting Neverwinter River's tributaries.
document_data.name: River Morgur
document_data.mainbody: The '''River Morgur''' was the northernmost tributary of the [[Neverwinter River]], located in the Neverwinter Wood.
document_data.Description: The river's mouth was located in the northeastern part of the Neverwinter River, south of [[Morgur's Mound]]. From there, the River Morgur weaved south, where it merged with the Neverwinter River.
